title: Query
description: This schema defines the type to capture any data asset's queries.

name.description: Name of an entity to which the query belongs to

fullyQualifiedName.description: Fully qualified name of a query.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Query. It could be title or label.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

duration.description: How long did the query took to run in milliseconds.

users.description: List of users who ran this query.

exclude_usage.description: Flag to check if query is to be excluded while processing usage

checksum.description: Checksum to avoid registering duplicate queries.

queryDate.description: Date on which the query ran.

usedBy.description: List of users who ran the query but does not exist in OpenMetadata.

queryUsedIn.description: Entities that are using this query

triggeredBy.description: Entity that triggered the query. E.g., a Stored Procedure or a Pipeline Task.

processedLineage.description: Flag if this query has already been successfully processed for lineage

service.description: Link to the service this query belongs to.

domain.description: Domain the asset belongs to. When not set, the asset inherits the domain from the parent it belongs to.
